Text: Lost Kings is an American DJ duo consisting of Robert Abisi and Nick Shanholtz, based in Los Angeles.

Text: Lost Kings:  The duo gained popularity beginning in 2014 through their official remixes for artists such as Imagine Dragons, Krewella, Halsey, Vance Joy, Echosmith, Rihanna, and Tori Kelly, and through their original EDM/progressive house music.
